data.title: Prime Video: The Cowboy Way
data.meta_description: Bubba, Cody, and Booger return in Season 2 of The Cowboy Way. Their business takes off as they move a big herd into Mississippi. Bubba struggles with a lucrative job offer and Cody kicks his rodeo business into high gear with a Bulls on the Beach event. It's wedding bells as Booger gets ready to tie the knot. There won't be a dry eye in the house in the
data.text:
In the season two premiere, Bubba, Cody and Booger land a big job moving cattle in Mississippi. Cody and Misty talk about Misty's future ambitions. Bubba finds out being Mr. Mom isn't child's play. And Booger contemplates wedding bells and diamond rings.

Cody, Bubba and Booger act fast to stop the spread of an infection across the herd. Bubba is caught between his work family in Alabama and his family life in Mississippi. Cody and Misty invest in their future. Booger prepares to pop the question.

All work, no play is not the cowboy way. Bubba, Cody and Booger have an office to build, but find time for a best man competition and a modern game of hide-and-go-seek. Jaclyn seeks the perfect dress. Misty finds Cody with a sweet surprise.

An easy job becomes risky business when the boys sort cattle. Torn between two worlds, Bubba trades saddles for spreadsheets. Cody seeks a sponsor to make Bulls on the Beach the biggest event yet. Booger gets swept off his feet with dance lessons.

A cowboy's life is rarely tame. In this episode, the boys must work quickly to subdue a cow before she riles up the herd. Bubba sees how profitable an office job can be, while Cody trains a wild, young colt. And getting ready for his final days of bachelor freedom, Booger goes out with the boys for one last hurrah.

Booger and Jaclyn will finally say "I do" on an extra-special episode of The Cowboy Way! There won't be a dry eye in the house when the happy couple weds in a gorgeous Southern ceremony. Come join in the celebration as these newlyweds ride into their happily ever after!

Things are heating up on The Cowboy Way! Booger and Jaclyn have fun in the sun on their honeymoon, while in Alabama, Misty feels the pressure of running her new business. When the boys sit down to talk about the future of Faith Cattle Co., the conversation turns red hot! Can they work it out? Or will Faith Cattle Co. go up in flames?
